item.title: After Bet On 'Black Myth: Wukong' Pays Off, Chinese Investor's Next Plan
item.description: Black Myth: Wukong has sold 18 million copies in two weeks - one of the fastest starts the global gaming industry has seen. That record pace has in turn minted millions for its earliest and biggest investor.

The Kindle Paperwhite made me enjoy reading books again
item.description: It's not without its flaws, but the 2021 Kindle Paperwhite is so nice to hold and look at that I can't go back to regular books.

item.title: Webb telescope has answers for an actual question mark in space
item.description: Astronomers studying star formation regions in the early universe with the James Webb Space Telescope found a rare galaxy cluster that punctuates the enigmatic cosmos.

item.title: Get an app to help you quickly apply to jobs for just $60
item.description: LazyApply automates your job applications so you can focus on acing interviews. Get it for life for just $60.

item.title: Get a $30 HD monocular telescope and zoom in on adventure

item.title: Kindle Paperwhite Signature Edition review: The upgrade is worth the money
item.description: The Kindle Paperwhite Signature Edition is the best e-reader out there, and it's not much pricier than the regular Kindle Paperwhite. Discover why we love it just in time for Stuff Your Kindle Day.
